mapper.select: select from hr_employees order by dept_code, pos_code

select e.emp_no, e.emp_name, e.EMP_BIRTH_DAY, e.EMP_HIRE_DATE, e.EMP_EMAIL, e.EMP_PASSWORD, e.EMP_GENDER, e.EMP_SALARY, e.EMP_PHONE, q.emp_name as emp_boss_name, e.emp_my_boss, e.pos_code, POS_NAME, e.dept_code, dept_name, e.role_code, e.profile from hr_employees e left join hr_employees q on (e.EMP_MY_BOSS = q.EMP_NO) join hr_position hp on e.POS_CODE = hp.POS_CODE join HR_DEPARTMENT d on e.DEPT_CODE = d.DEPT_CODE where e.emp_no = #{empNo}
